name: Shrine (itch) (vadik07)
description:
Short adventure game in which you have to recover the gem that protects the town from the hands of the orc king.

Please let me know if you find some bugs! Thanks!
(English is not my main language so it is very likely that there will be mistakes in the dialogues.Sorry about that!)

How to play (It is recommended to play with Gamepad):

Movement : Left Stick / Arrow keys.
Attack : X Button / Z button on keyboard.
Interact : R1 Button / C button on keyboard.
Bow attack (when unlocked) : B Button / X button on keyboard.
Magic attack (requires spells) : Y Button / Alt button on keyboard.
Inventory / Pause : Start Button / I or Escape button on keyboard.
Select spells : In inventory, DPAD / Mouse to select.
